column2:
Please solve the following logic puzzle in the following table: 

|        |       1    |    2    |    3     |    4    |    5    |
| nationality |         |         |         |         |         |
| color  |         |         |         |         |         |
| beverage |         |         |         |         |         |
| cigar  |         |         |         |         |         |
| pet  |         |         |         |         |          

Puzzle: 
 
There are 5 different favourite colors: ebony, lilac, blood-red, amber, white
There are 5 different nationalities: nigerian, canadian, brazilian, dutch, pakistani
5 different brands of cigars are smoked: swisher, montecristo, dannemann, tiparillo, game
There are 5 different favourite beverages: almond-soy-milk, hot-chocolate, soy-milk, fanta, mirinda
5 different pets are kept: rabbit, pony, frog, hamster, chinchilla

1. the nigerian is the person who likes ebony
2. the canadian is the owner of the rabbit
3. the person drinking almond-soy-milk is the person who likes lilac
4. the brazilian is the person drinking hot-chocolate
5. the person who likes lilac is to the right of the person who likes blood-red
6. the swisher-smoker is the owner of the chinchilla
7. the montecristo-smoker is the person who likes amber
8. the person drinking soy-milk is in the middle
9. the dutch is on the far left
10. the dannemann-smoker is on the left or right of the owner of the pony
11. the montecristo-smoker is to the left or right of the owner of the hamster
12. the tiparillo-smoker is the person drinking fanta
13. the pakistani is the game-smoker
14. the dutch is to the left or right of the person who likes white. Please put '#############' around the final solution table.
